name: Reverie (itch)
description:
Imagine being locked in a room. The world outside the door is dark, unknown. You fear it, yet you somehow feel attracted by it.

Presented, for now, in a demo version, Reverie is an interactive visual novel with horror elements which focuses on the theme of memories.

You're the protagonist of the story, trapped in your apartment and with no other way to escape from the loop of waking up inside it but by confronting the memories outside the door.

Your apartment is both your weapon and your cage. Thanks to it you'll be able to experience the block that in your memories that forbids you to retrieve them, to interact with items that will influence your mood...but consequences will happen if you'll experience too many traumas.

Your only companion through your quest to retrieve your memory and the freedom to continue living again is a girl that connects with you through the computer in order to to help you in understanding what is happening and why.

When you exit the door you'll face the block in your memories. A situation you have to confront in order to go on with your life. But if you'll succeed or not is up to you.
